articles.content: YourSingapore StoryYourSingapore StoryFor generations, The Straits Times has told The Singapore Story. To celebrate our 180th anniversary, weâ€™re putting the spotlight on our readers â€“ for you to tell us yours. Your Singapore Story is a special series that celebrates the lives, memories and dreams in every corner of the country, from tales of resilience and reinvention to the quiet moments behind every morning kopi ritual. These are your stories. And weâ€™ll be telling them for generations to come.

articles.content: The Straits Times  Log in  Manage account Subscribe Log out    From local to global: What made top news in Singapore over the last 180 years? What makes the news? A look back at 180 yearsâ€™ worth of front-page headlines â€“ from the very first edition of The Straits Times on July 15, 1845 â€“ shows that news is everywhere: from right at your doorstep to the world beyond and more. BY CHEE WEIXIAN, ELIZABETH LAW AND LEE PEI JIE | PUBLISHED: JULY 15, 2025   Toa PayohChoa Chu KangOrchardPunggolClementiAn
